nodes.text: The Ossifrage was an RZ-1 A-wing interceptor that was owned by Greer Sonnel. At some point, the ship had been used to fight the Galactic Empire, and had been slightly damaged. Greer purchased the A-wing, modifying it, and used it during a race known as the Gauntlet. Despite minor damages to the Ossifrage, Greer won the race with the help of Han Solo.
